A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Parts that where good where amazing (Rey/Kylo). But when they made a mistake ( bad unplaced jokes/ruining a lead role/forced storytelling at the casino/terrible time management in the story/Space Leia?!?) it was unforgivable bad.\nDisney should stick more to the EU than wanting to make a kid/family movie. And look back at the roots what made ep IV /V / VI amazing. (Stunning movies with a double layerd story telling\, and subtile jokes. It was too forced in TLJ.)
